eheth eka sigarattuwath dekata kadagena bona lankawe, pakattuwe rupamaya awawada, ‘janathawage’ jiwithaya saha maranaya athara pa්rashnayak se huwadakwimata walikana ape waidya wisheshagnyayan, buddhimathun saha deshapalagnyayan me karanaya gana eeta wada yonisomanasikarayen baliya yuthuwa thibuni.
hariyata nikan ekama sarwis eke fri ho ikonomik sarwis ekayi bisnas klas ekayi wage...mata ethakota labune bisnas klas law ekak..narakama na wade..
namuth wadeta awashya karana thuwakkuwak game thibune na.
meka del wenna gaththe ee pathala wada haraha sallikarayan wu samaharun mulin adunagath deshapalakayin haraha rajya palanayatath ringimata patan gath witayi.
eya sil thabana lakada kalla thibenne agamathi thuma athe ya.
job karala panthi dekak athara niwudu welawe korido wala budiya gannawa...
mehe nam thama wikunana , proses karana than thiyenawa .
kanna aapana shalawak nathi wela thiyanawa.
yalith mulin patan ganima yanu wasara gananawakin rata aapassata yamaki.ebandu modakamak kara gannata tharam janathawa manda buddhika nowanu atha.

paya kipayak thisse ada haluna maha warshawen nagoda hathara manhandiya pasugiyada sampurnayenma jalayen yatawi giyeya.polis abhyasa widyala margayeth nabada margayeth boho durak jalayen yatawimen yathurupadiyen, papadiyen ha pagamanin yana pirisa mahath asiruwata pathwuha.me margayanta yabadawa athi kumbauru yayanda jalayen piri giyeya.mita wasara kipayakata pera mewani thaththwayak athi nowuwada ada mese nagoda hathara manhandiya maha wassakata yatawi yamata hethu kipayak athi bawa pradeshawasihu prakasha karathi.warsha jalaya basa yamata athi pradhana ala margaya wana moran ala margaya mulu maninma welaatha gas athulu wiwidha gas walin wasi yamath, paswalin godawimath nisa me thaththwayata pathwa thibe.thama dainika karyayan sandaha menma pasal kara yana pirisa dadi asiruthawata pathwana nagoda hatharaman handiya, wijitha mawatha saha sentral handiyada maha wassakadi pawa adi deka thunak jalayen yatawi yamata hethuwana moran ala athulu athuru ala marga jalaya basa yana aakarayata prathisanskaranaya kirima pilibandawada baladharinge awadhanayata yomu kara siti.  .
emenma aagamata dahamata multhana di diwiya pura pas pawen walaki katayuthu kirima nisath thamange diwiya metharam sapawath wu bawa age adahasayi.

miliyana 4,500k wen kirima gana janadhipathiwaraya wetha prasadaya pala kara sitiye ya.okthobar 8-10 dinawala shri lankawe pawathwena dakunu aasiyanu werala krida ulele siyalu katayuthu me wana wita sudanam kara athi bawath, ee sandaha ratawal 08ka kridaka kridikawan 500k pamana sahabhagi wana bawath mehidi anawaranaya wiya.podu rajya mandalayiya krida kamitu mangin methek sidu kara athi karyabharaya pilibanda mehidi maha banku adhipathi ajith niwad kabral mahatha karunu pahadili kaleya. 2018 podu rajya mandalayiya krida ulela pawathwena rata pilibanda thiranaya 2011 nowambar masa 11 da prakashayata path kirimata niyamitha ya.me abhiyogaya jaya ganima sandaha kapawimen katayuthu karana samata prasadaya pala kala janadhipathiwaraya me sandaha swechchawenma idiripath wu anugrahakayan wetha wishesha sthuthiya mehidi pala kaleya.me sakachchawa sandaha olimpik kamituwe shri lanka sabhapathi hemasiri pranandu mahatha athulu niladharihu, podu rajya mandalayiya krida kamitu pradhanihu saha anugrahakayo athulu pirisak sahabhagi wuha..

pasuwa ema tharuniyawada nithyanukulawa wiwaha karagena athi sakakaru thalawakale pradeshaye padinchiwi aya samaga wasaya kara atha.mathakadi sakakaruge thalawakale birinda widesha rakiyawak sadaha pitathwa gos atha.aya widesha rakiyawak sadaha laba dima wenuwen widesha rakiya niyojitha aayathanaya wisin sakakaruta rupiyal laksha 2 ½ ka mudalakda laba di athi bawa polisiya wisin heli karagena atha.dewana birinda widesha gatha wimen pasuwa ayata ayath gruha bhanda saha ran aabharanada wahanayaka patawagena athi sakakaru nawagaththegama - marungoda pradeshaye padinchiwa sitina thama palamu birindage niwasata pamina aya samanga nawathath pawul jiwithayak aarambha kara atha.thalawakale padinchi sakakaruge dewani birindage gnyathin wisin ohu pilibadawa soya bala nawagaththegama polisiyata pamina paminillak kara atha.ee anuwa wimarshana katayuthu sidu kara athi polisiya sakakaruwa athadanguwata gena atha.athadanguwata gena athi sakakaru puththalama disa adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamithaya.
